title: Google Pixel 2 hard brick
content: I have smartphone device (Google Pixel 2) which is "hard bricked", does not turn on. In  Windows Device Manager device detected as "Qualcomm HS-USB QDLoader 9008". I want to transfer this smartphone from state "hard brick" to state "soft brick" via QPST programm(Qualcomm Product Support Tool). But I can`t find files that I need in the Internet. Where can I find them?
